excerpt.rendered:
COMPLETE COURSE OF PHOSPHENISM for MP3 (300 Mo)

A scientifically improved Zoroastrian Initiation in which Dr. LEFEBURE speaks in simple words about the Initiation, its benefits and the best way to obtain incredible spiritual experiences.

Each claim put forth by Dr. LEFEBURE can be easily verified by experiments that he explains in details.

Nevertheless, he not only explains the highest initiatic techniques, but he also talks about their origins and the implications of Phosphenism in the human history.

Dr. LEFEBURE shows us the ins and outs of Initiation, its nature and what can be expected from it.

meta._et_pb_old_content: A 10 hours and 25 minutes audio set with 16 tracks in.mp3 format. This theoretical and practical course of Phosphenism is ideal for those who want to become Initiates.
